ARABIC: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبًا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخْرَجُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who are kafir say, 'When we and our fathers are turned to dust will we then be brought forth again?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who do not believe, say: "When we and our fathers have turned to dust, how shall we be raised again?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The unbelievers say: "When we become dust, we and our forefathers, shall we really be brought out (from our graves)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The unbelievers have said, "Shall we and our fathers be brought out of the graves after we become dust?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the disbelievers said, “Will we, when we and our forefathers have turned into dust, be removed again?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who disbelieve say: "When we have become dust -- we and our fathers -- shall we really be brought forth"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those who disbelieve say: What! when we have become dust and our fathers (too), shall we certainly be brought forth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The unbelievers say, 'What, when we are dust, and our fathers, shall we indeed be brought forth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Yet those who disbelieve say: When we have become dust like our fathers, shall we verily be brought forth (again)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who deny the truth say, "When we have turned to dust like our fathers, shall we be brought back to life again?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who disbelieve say: when we have become dust, we and our fathers, shall we, for sooth, be brought forth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The faithless say, ‘What! When we and our fathers have become dust shall we be raised [from the dead]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Unbelievers say: "What! when we become dust,- we and our fathers,- shall we really be raised (from the dead)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who disbelieve say: "When we have become dust, we and our fathers, shall we really be brought forth (again)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The unbelievers say: 'When we and our fathers are turned to dust, shall we be brought forth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who disbelieve say, “When we have become dust, and our ancestors, shall we be brought out?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those who disbelieve say, "When we have become dust as well as our forefathers, will we indeed be brought out [of the graves]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:67] And the disbelievers say, also in rejecting the [idea of] resurrection: ‘What! When we and our fathers are dust shall we indeed be brought forth [again]?, from the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Yet those who disbelieve) the disbelievers of Mecca (say: when we have become) scattered (dust like our fathers) before us, (shall we verily be brought forth (again)) given life again and brought out of the graves?
